Lab.Description: In this hands-on lab you will examine each of the foundation storage capabilities of Windows Azure-Blobs, Tables and Queues. You'll discover how to create storage accounts, how to upload and retrieve blobs and blob metadata, how to create, update and query tables, and how to create a simple service that uses a message queue for communication. Finally, you'll explore the use of Windows Azure Drives.
Lab.Title: Exploring Windows Azure Storage - for Visual Studio 2012
